text: Esmond Richard Roney (12 July 1907 - 22 January 1979) was a sailor from Great Britain, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. He was the brother of Margaret Roney and Ernest Roney. ==Sources== * Category:British male sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 8 Metre Category:Olympic sailors of Great Britain Category:1907 births Category:1979 deaths
title: Esmond Roney
